paragraphs.heading: Customize the workspace
paragraphs.body: Enter the edit mode to change the layout of your workspace, this mode is always available next to settings in the top right

paragraphs.heading: Widgets
paragraphs.body: Use widgets to add functionality to your workspace

paragraphs.heading: Rundown
paragraphs.body: Add items to your rundown by right-clicking or dragging them in

paragraphs.heading: Inspector
paragraphs.body: The inspector lets you edit items
